title: Changing the languages of client and voice packs for champs on non-english regions ( HELP )
body:
I've transferred from euw to the tr servers about 2 weeks ago and I've been struggling with the client ever since because of the language itself. I'm basically interacting with the client based on my memory of what it looked like on euw and that doesn't always work specially in the in game settings. 
So I've been wondering if there is a way I could manually change the language of the client to English and maybe the voices of the champs too because It really annoys me to listen to them with other voices and languages. 
Thanks in advance.

replies.body:
There may be a way to change them manually, but unfortunately, I won't be able to assist you with a manual change since we don't support them. =/

If you have any other questions, let me know!
You don't support them meaning if I do somehow change them manually from guides on youtube, will I be banned?

We typically look for modifications that intend to provide a competitive advantage over others when we suspend accounts for modifications. If your modification doesn't give you a competitive advantage over others, it isn't usually something we specifically suspend an account for.

I hope that clears up the confusion!
